author: highlander
title: Cardano Savings & Loan - PoC
description: The Cardano blockchain needs more investing and savings options for ADA holders who wish to earn rewards or interest on their holdings.
solution: A Cardano bank that will allow holders to deposit their ADA and earn interest that will exceed what they can receive in a stake pool.
experience: We are the team behind the Highlander platform. Chris is our lead developer and has extensive experience writing smart contracts on Ethereum
